Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This item not only serves its intended purpose but also embodies elegance and functionality. Considering its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than just its monetary value. For you, I am offering this extraordinary product at an exclusive price of $125. I trust this investment will provide you with immense satisfaction and utility. Let me know if you're interested in bringing this piece into your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
